patthana21.40:1.1_0: Naappaccayaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaccayo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.40:2.1_0: Naappaccayaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaccayo anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.40:3.1_0: (Naappaccayanaanidassanaappaṭighamūlepi ekameva.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
